quest.name: Hobgob Smacker
journal:
 Quest Sync
Grawley seems fit to explode.
objectives: Place the bulging sack of foodstuffs at the designated location.
Lie in wait and defeat the hobgoblin thieves.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: ...Sorry, friend, that wasn't meant for you. It's those bastard hobgoblins...

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: They know none of us are fighters, so they just skulk in and raid our food stores, brazen as you please! But I bet you could give them somethin' to chew on, eh?

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Here, take this supply sack and drop it just outside the village. Once them thieving blighters come sniffing about, you spring out of hiding and unleash a storm of righteous justice!

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Justice must be served! Set the table with that supply sack and make sure them hobgobbers get a proper helping!

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Yes! Vengeance for our missed meals and rumbling bellies! Fine work, my friend!

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: Hobgoblins have plagued this island for as long as anyone can remember. They're cunning enough to make tools, but still they act like beasts─mean, filthy brutes what lack the barest shred of common decency!

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: And even though you've cowed them for the moment, I fear the lesson won't stick. Oh, they'll be back. You can be sure of that.

dialogue.name: GRAWLEY
dialogue.text: In the meantime, we'll need to think of a more permanent solution...
